meanings.definition: Driven or led astray or in the wrong direction.
meanings.sent1: The misdriven car ended up in a field instead of the parking lot.
meanings.sent2: The misdriven hiker got lost in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The misdriven squirrel kept going in circles around the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her misdriven decisions led her further away from her goals.
meanings.sent5: The misdriven boat drifted aimlessly in the lake.

meanings.sent1: The misdriven remote control wouldn't change the channel.
meanings.sent2: The misdriven lawnmower wouldn't start no matter how many times he pulled the cord.
meanings.sent3: The misdriven toy car kept crashing into the walls.
meanings.sent4: His misdriven attempts at fixing the sink only made the leak worse.
meanings.sent5: The misdriven computer mouse moved erratically on the screen.

meanings.sent1: Her misdriven passion for painting led her to pursue a career in finance instead.
meanings.sent2: The misdriven student studied the wrong chapter for the exam.
meanings.sent3: The misdriven cat tried to catch a reflection on the wall.
meanings.sent4: His misdriven ambition to impress others made him lose sight of his true self.
meanings.sent5: The misdriven compass pointed in the opposite direction of the destination.
